titles.title: A resolution providing for printing of a collection of statements made in tribute to the late Senator Robert F. Kennedy.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Procurement and Printing.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

bill.summary: 8/2/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the printing of a collection of statements made in tribute to the late Senator Robert F. Kennedy as a House document. Authorizes the printing of an additional number of such documents for the use of the Committee on House Administration.
